column5: Don't forget my beer!!!
Try not Dave.  I hope to have some extra time in Yellowknife to get that chance, but to also hang out with a bud from the highschool days.
Let me know.
have always enjoyed your reports. Sorry it took me a while to get to it ... haven't been on the board much lately. But you just got my vote! Good luck
Right on doods! and.... bump.  1 week left... or 5 or 6 days or something.
No problem Drew. I posted it on my wall yesterday and all 2 of my friends voted for you!!!  Don't forget my beer!!!!
I'm doing my part for you MB. The way I look at it, if you win, we all win with the report and photos that will follow.

Right On Dan!  It would certainly be a trip that would find its way back home here to Ontario, and one report that would be owed "big time" to many.  Less than a week of hoping to hold on.  Support if you can with any votes.  Thanks.     Dave... liking the Innis & Gunn of late.
I keep on keepin' on... I push my buds to vote for ya...  Good Luck Moose!!  You're up by almost 200 votes.. It's in the bag mon ami!!    Randy
Take that back bud.  In the ER one of us said "it's quiet" at the beginning of our shift last night.  Man, we paid for that all night.   Karma is a b-ee-yotch!
I even joined FB just to vote everyday bud!!  (well I actually joined to vote for someone else.. somewhere else.. but .. LOL)
Nice!  Even if it was for a better cause.  I don't know if extra votes in the end are being counted or not, but if they are allowed they certainly can't hurt.
Bunk-is it a certainty that you WILL get the trip if your article ends up with the most votes??

To quote the contest rules sent in email to past guests...  ... "The story with the most "likes" will win a trip to any Plummer's Lodge, anytime in the summer of 2011.  Contest closes March 31st...   That sounds like a "WILL" to me Darsky.
O.K ...I take it back...  It looks like you almost have it in the bag mon ami!

Get out of bed at noon.  Check! Coffee... check! Take the boat motor for a tune-up... check! Sniff some liquid tape to fix the frayed wire to the transducer... ohhh check! Log on to OFC and bump this post... Yep Checkin'.   4-5 more days now, then I'll quit hounding and leave everyone alone. CHECK!
Found this on page 2.  It's getting near quitting time... but time near quitting it's not.  Few more days.  Gotta hold on!
Head and shoulders above your nearest competition....  You almost have'r in da bag  mon ami!!  Good on you!

A little more than 24 hours to go...   Thanks so much to everyone for taking the time to give me a vote in the contest.  If it's meant to happen I'll be sure to come back and take everyone along in a report.
I liked your story. You can contact me when we are going. Just give me 2 days notice. Thanks
Another vote from me, keep the awesome reports coming,
Congrats MOOSEBUNK!!!!!!!  :clapping:  I'm looking forward to your post!!  Enjoy yourselves...   Randy
Drew's still out doing cartwheels... just got a report he was thru Stittsville and on his way to Carp... lol

I got work all weekend Wayne.  First of 3 today was just the perfect pace.  Didn't have to cartwheel through it, just a nice crawl with a couple somersalts.  Next friday I'm hoping to wake from a nightshift and find a message in the inbox.  Then it'll be backflips.

what lodge ya staying at moose? or will you be going for tree river char all week? i officially got in as a plummers lodge employee, should be at the main lodge starting july 16th for 6 weeks.. let me know when your going !! oh yeah and CONGRATS!!!!!
Congrats andrew just saw on facebook you officialy won the free trip!!!!!!! Yehawwwww!!
Congrats Moosebunk!
I just saw that too.  Thanks guys.  Thanks OFC'ers.  On cloud 9 right now and ready to get to planning the return to Plummer's Arctic paradise.  I'll finally sleep tonight too. lol.

335, a small price to pay I cant tell you how many times ive read that novel of a report on plummers, your attawapiskat report convinced me to go and it was the trip of my life so far, I can only imagine what it will be like when i finally make the trek up to plummers but in the mean time we get to live through your reports, much appreciated
More votes keep comin' from OFC'ers... right on!  Appreciated.  I'm stoked about the possibility of this!!!   Thanks all.
Awesome dood.  Amazing river to travel and fish, and home to some great friends.
done - keep up the great reports !

That's just me Wayner... horny for fish.  I'll let Bren know to cast a vote Jen's way too.
Glad to help Bunk.....I'll spread the word on facebook as well..."I have like 92 friends, well 10 are pending, but I'm hopeful!"
So Drew, when are we going to fish for those Tree River char?
I already tried that tact Bill.. and got something about Bren looking better in waders than any of us!
I can't compete with that, lol.

Billy if you're on FB and you haven't looked me up.  Shame on ya!!!  And no, ya can't compete.  If the contest was for 20 people I'd still be looking for all the fishing partners to be women first.  Haha!   Abberz... get working on those 10 other friendships bud!

LOL I take it you haven't seen the movie "Due Date" with Zach Galifinakis?  Glad to see you're getting some serious results bro! GL
It looks good for the Bunkster buying me a few wobbly pops at the Monkey Tree in Yellowknife as long as things stay the way they are.

heading to vote for you!!! awesome place..ive been trying to get into plummers as a guide for the past 5 years..i finally just might have my chance there this summer, shanes a great guy and full of knowledge..i actually did a sportsman show with him last week!!! man i hope you win it would be awesome to fish with you hahahaha
Drifter... Dave... You're a big dood.  I'll have to cut you off at 3.  Carl, that'd be pretty cool if it happens.  Good luck getting the job.

Please, if you haven't voted take a second and do so.  It only takes a second if you have a FB account.  Link is page 1.  I'll repost again below.
Vote "like" for,  "Lying Beneath The Dream Giving Tree."   http://www.plummerslodges.com/share-your-story-contest/entries  Thanks again all.

I remember that post very well. Probably my favorite post ever on the board. I printed it out at the time and passed it on to a few buddies. I will be posting my "like" as soon as I get home tonight. I can't wait for your "next" Plummer's Lodge Report!!!!!

Hi All.  I have a huge favor to ask anyone and everyone who has ever enjoyed a Moosebunk report.  I need your "like" which is basically a vote.  For a number of years I have pumped out fishing reports to several Ontario fishing boards.  It's a labor of love, something I do for myself as much as others.  Countless hours as many know, have gone into writing and sharing photos online with other anglers.  One report in particular always stood out as my favorite, and that was when Brenda and I shared a trip to Plummer's Arctic Lodge in the NWT.  The original report I spread online for everyone was 90 photos and 11,000 words.  Quite an undertaking.  After that post, Big Jim approached me to ask I rewrite that report into 3000 words for his magazine "Just Fishing."  We had to settle on a 6000 word piece to be run over two issues.  I donated what was arguably my best written work to Jim for this, in thanks for him for running the article.  Later, Plummer's asked if they could use my online report for reprint in their magazine Arctic Lure, I was happy to grant this request.  Some time passed when later a friend of mine caught my picture in a magazine.  A char photo was an advertisement for Plummer's.  Just in that trip experience alone I have worked a ridiculous amount of time and enjoyed every minute.  17,000 words and 90 photos is equivalent to 7-10 feature articles in a magazine like Outdoor Canada.  My payment was simply the satisfaction and pleasure of it for myself and others.  PLUMMER'S ARCTIC LODGES HAS A STORY CONTEST ON RIGHT NOW AVAILABLE TO PAST GUESTS AND I HAVE MADE A SUBMISSION.  ALLOWED 750 WORDS I HAVE DESCRIBED MY 2008 TRIP THERE AS THE CONTEST GUIDELINES REQUEST.  THE PERSON'S STORY WHICH RECEIVES THE MOST "LIKES" AT THEIR WEBSITE, WINS A RETURN TRIP.  IT'S AT THIS TIME, I BEG ANY OF YOU TO PLEASE GIVE ME YOUR VOTE AND ALLOW ME TO RELIVE PLUMMER'S AGAIN, SO I MIGHT RETURN BACK TO YOU ALL WITH ANOTHER GREAT STORY TO TELL.  GO TO THIS LINK PROVIDED AND BELOW MY STORY WHICH IS TITLED,  "LYING BENEATH THE DREAM GIVING TREE."  CLICK ON THE "LIKE" ICON THERE BELOW MY STORY TITLE SO I CAN COUNT YOUR VOTE.   http://www.plummerslodges.com/share-your-story-contest/entries'>http://www.plummerslodges.com/share-your-story-contest/entries'>http://www.plummerslodges.com/share-your-story-contest/entries  http://www.plummerslodges.com/share-your-story-contest/entries  http://www.plummerslodges.com/share-your-story-contest/entries   A million thanks to all who vote.  It would be greatly appreciated you take this 1-minute to hook a brother up.   Moosebunk.
